text: #COVID19 #vaccine may be getting all the attention. But as you prepare for the holidays, don’t forget to get a #flu shot. It helps protect loved ones with chronic conditions – such as #diabetes, #asthma or #heart #disease. We all #FightFlu! Learn more: https://t.co/mISyqbLbEX https://t.co/nTJDeAw8KZ
